function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Risk of spreading contagious diseases due to mobility patterns and visitation to parks","lack of effective pandemic response policies","Potential increase in health inequalities due to severe restrictions to mobility and park use during the covid-19 pandemic","Wealthier residents less likely to increase their visits to green spaces during the covid-19 lockdown","Residents reporting poorer health status during covid-19 lockdown","Lack of management knowledge about the impact of covid-19 on urban green spaces","Negative impact of covid-19 on physical and mental health of residents due to lack of access to urban green spaces","Inadequate monitoring of indoor air quality iaq parameters","Reliance on iot for realtime monitoring may lead to system failures, causing hazardous conditions to go undetected","Inadequate control of global business cycles","Health risks and reduced labor productivity due to social distancing measures"]}
